game_description: To become MasterBuilder you need to acquire all the master artifacts throughout the world. MasterBuilder delivers an open-world sandbox experience with endless creation systems and unique physicalities. Looking for a game that will unleash your creativity and spark your imagination? Look no further than MasterBuilder, a VR sandbox game that lets you build, explore, and experiment to your heart's content! With its unique procedural generation and terraforming system, MasterBuilder offers an endlessly customizable experience that allows you to craft your very own virtual world with no directions, no goals, and no limits. And best of all, MasterBuilder is a game that's great for all ages! Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for a casual, relaxing experience, MasterBuilder offers a sense of curiosity for all. With no time limits, no pressure, and no restrictions, MasterBuilder lets you explore your creativity at your own pace and in your own way. Enter a world of creativity. Discover the master artifacts scattered throughout the procedurally-generated island sandbox, and unleash your imagination with the unique terraforming and creation systems. With the Day'n'Night Invaders update, experience a dynamic day and night cycle, a new lighting system, and the option of facing off against AI invaders. Create, smash, and adventure your way to becoming the ultimate MasterBuilder.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), Italian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: It is fun and challenging but when I shoot the red wand it will kick me out so can you please fix it soon
review_2: An absolutely amazing pre-release, there are a few things missing at the moment, but this game is already such a great concept, and very original, and the future of this game is incredibly promising! It includes some highly interesting and original game mechanics, and I can't wait to see what happens with future updates!
review_3: I recently did a Review of this game on my youtube if you want to check it out, just look for Papa Boney VR, the devs seem to be passionate about this project, it is already pretty good, and when they implement the updates they are talking about, I'm sure it will be even better!
review_4: Our whole family (including the kids) are having a blast with this game!! I have found the Hammer and the wand and almost built up to one of the clouds. Highly recommend playing the game and Luke I said, it is great for kids as well. The Dev team did a great job on this one!
review_5: Great sandbox game with a fun exploration element as you try to collect all artefacts to become the Master Builder. I have included it in my top 10 app lab list (https://youtu.be/8ZG7KHOOan8) and have one code to giveaway thanks to the generous devs.
